AUROC=0.8030226924340303	AUPRC=0.4726843028690114	Accuracy=0.9680058743312703	Recall=0.295	Precision=0.8368794326241135	f1_score=0.4362292051756007

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.97      1.00      0.98      9133
        case       0.84      0.29      0.44       400

   micro avg       0.97      0.97      0.97      9533
   macro avg       0.90      0.65      0.71      9533
